item.title: Logistic Regression
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 导入包 import numpy as np import pandas as pd 导入数据 data = pd.read_csv("./datasets/Social_Network_Ads.csv") data.head() User ID Gender Age EstimatedSalary Purchased 0 15624510 Male 19 19000 0 1 15810944 Male 35 20000 0 2 15668575 Female 26 43000 0 3 15603246 Female 27 57000 0 4 15804002 Male 19 76000 0 X = data.iloc[:,[2,3]].values Y = data.iloc[:,4].values 交叉验证 from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split X_train,X_test,Y_train,Y_test
